page.title: 12A modern house
page.content:
My house has a{living room,}two {bathrooms,}two{bedrooms,}a{kitchen, and an{office.}My dad draws plans and my mum types letters for him. We changed our spare bedroom into the office. I like our house!
We have a{telephone}in the living room and an extension in the office. We have a{computer,}it is a Commodore 64. We have two {televisions,}one colour and one black and white. I have a{piano}and I do piano practice for half an hour each night.
We have a{gas fire}and{electric {central heating.}The{cavity walls}are insulated with polystyrene. We use a {Calor gas cooker}to cook on. My favourite food is Toad-in-the-hole.
